amendment.description: Amendment adds a reserve fund requirement to the National Flood Insurance Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 112-138 to add a reserve fund requirement to the National Flood Insurance Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Westmoreland amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 183 (Roll no. 557).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Westmoreland amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 183 (Roll no. 557).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Westmoreland.
